desc: One by Prism is a seamless home delivery service provider of compression, skin care, specialty wound care and maternity care products. We are home medical supply specialists with a focus on customer service, wellness and offering the best maternity, athletic compression, skin care and wound care products around the US.

layout.text: From compression socks, stockings and sleeves to leg rests and assistive devices, we deliver high quality Compression Garments and Accessories at affordable prices.
